Terms & Conditions

Effective Date: [02/08/2024]

Welcome to POZY Trains. These Terms & Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of our services, including our website, mobile applications, and any other products or services provided by POZY Trains. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with these Terms, please do not use our services.

1. Definitions - "POZY Trains" ,"we", "us", or "our" refers to POZY Trains Ltd., a company incorporated under the laws of India.
- "Services" refers to all services provided by POZY Trains, including Trains transportation, ticket sales, customer support, and any related activities.

2.Services - POZY Trains provides railway transportation services including ticket booking, seat reservations, and Trains travel. The availability of specific routes, services, and schedules may vary and are subject to change without notice.

3. Ticketing and Reservations
- 3.1 Booking: Tickets can be purchased through our website, mobile app, or authorized agents. All bookings are subject to availability.
- 3.2 Payment: Full payment is required at the time of booking. We accept various payment methods as listed on our payment page.
- 3.3 Cancellations and Refunds: Cancellations and refunds are subject to our Cancellation Policy, which can be reviewed on our website. Fees and conditions apply.

4. User Responsibilities
- 4.1 Compliance: You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations when using our services.
- 4.2 Conduct: You agree to use our services for lawful purposes only and not to engage in any behavior that may disrupt or interfere with the operation of our services or the experience of other users.

5. Limitation of Liability - To the fullest extent permitted by law, POZY Trains shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from or related to the use of our services. Our liability for any direct damages shall be limited to the amount paid by you for the specific service giving rise to the claim.

6. Force Majeure - POZY Trains shall not be liable for any failure to perform its obligations under these Terms if such failure is due to events beyond our reasonable control, including but not limited to natural disasters, strikes, or governmental actions.

7. Intellectual Property - All intellectual property rights related to our services, including trademarks, copyrights, and patents, are owned by POZY Trains or its licensors. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any of our intellectual property without prior written permission.

8. Privacy Policy - Your use of our services is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Please review ourPrivacy Policy.

9. Changes to Terms - POZY Trainss reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. Any changes will be posted on our website, and your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the updated Terms.

10. Governing Law - These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India, without regard to its conflict of law principles. Any disputes arising under or in connection with these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in India.

11. Contact Us - If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms or our services, please contact us at:
- Email: [pozyTrainss@gmail.com]
- Phone: [+91 73592 91005]
Thank you for choosing POZY Trains. We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you.

---
